p: To evaluate significance of explanatory factors, we started with a full model and then compared it with a model without the tested factor via a log likelihood test. All chi-square statistics and associated P-values in the results section refer to log likelihood test results. We checked assumptions of all models at each step of the model procedure. We fitted all mixed models with package lme4 ( Bates et al. 2014 ) in statistical package R ( R Core Team 2016).
